世人都晓神仙好，只是功名忘不来！

世人都晓神仙好，只是金钱忘不了！

title: Hello World

When n is a positive interger, $\Gamma(n+1)=n!$, and
$$ B(p,q)=\frac{\Gamma(p+q)}{\Gamma(p)\Gamma(q)} $$
seem to be all right?
title: Math Test
